# Transmissions from Empire Algol

| label      = Moonfog
| producer   = Fenriz
| prev_title = Caravans to Empire Algol
| prev_year  = 1994
| next_title =
| next_year  =
}}
Transmissions from Empire Algol is the second and final studio album by the Norwegian dark ambient project Neptune Towers, a similar-sounding follow-up to 1994's Caravans to Empire Algol, expanding on the same concept. It was released in 1995 by Moonfog Productions. Excerpts from the unreleased third album Space Lab were included within a 2012 Peaceville reissue of the album.
Track listing
Personnel
* Fenriz - keyboards, recording, producer, engineering
